name: DOLCE VITA ★1 NIGHT ONLY★ NYE 2013 PARTY!!
description:
How you spend your new year is what shapes the next – The question "what are you doing for New Years Eve" is lingering and we have the answer!

We are excited to call upon you to join us in counting down with drinks, toasts and a celebration of Dolce Vita...

Originating in Italy, the words Dolce Vita translate to “Sweet Life” an expression carefully selected to coin the event where together we invite you to accompany us greeting 2013!

Monday 31st December, 2012 – We look forward to serenading the year passed & that which is yet to come in the newly refurbished Marquee Lounge Bar at the Trak in Toorak.

Dolce Vita will be hosting an open bar serving all you can drink house basics till 12:30 provisioning the evening’s required lechayims, nazdaroviyas, prosts, gambeis, saluts, mazal tovs, toasts & celebrations!

-	Spirits
-	Local Beers
-	Champagne & Wine

For the beverage aficionado’s Marquee has prepared a carefully curated selection of NYE cocktails priced at $15 a pop to be available throughout the night.

Canapés, Hors D’oeuvres, sweet & savoury, cold & hot will be provided to sensibly commence the evening.

Tickets to this soirée are limited & will be released in 3 rounds as we draw towards the event.

Secure your ticket for $90 bucks & join in on an elegant NYE affair!!

New Years Eve is almost here… Where will you be at midnight??

For any enquiries, please contact one of the numbers below any time:

Brian’chik – 04888 111 01

Ben’chik – 0412 378 635
